title: Cardiac transcriptomic changes induced by early CKD in mice reveal novel pathways involved in the pathogenesis of Cardiorenal syndrome type 4
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Francisco Javier Munguia-Galaviz, Yanet Karina Gutierrez-Mercado, Alejandra Guillermina Miranda-Diaz, Eliseo Portilla de Buen, Mario Eduardo Flores-Soto, Raquel Echavarria
